name: Thorngate
description:
After a brief accident involving a truck, you're now in charge of your very own Dungeon Core.

Your task is to build a dungeon to summon the Elder God. To do this, you'll need to lure in heroes to collect resources from them to further expand your dungeon.

Controls:

  • WASD to scroll the screen
  • Space to pause

Made in 3 days because I hate myself.

Asset credits

  • Kyrise- Icons
  • Aekashics- Monster Sprites
  • Pixeltier- Icons
  • Pita - Tileset and sprites
  • David McKee (ViRiX) - SFX
  • FarBeyond Studio - Music
  • jkjkke- Title card
